Description: Webjs is a JavaScript framework that uses Node.js as a means to offer developers websites' and web apps' with a server-side script that is more stable and more readable.
Bone.io allows for the building of real time HTML5 apps using web sockets to deliver "hot" data to a browser. This aims to provide a construct rich, highly responsive user interface for developers.

Pintura aims to be a cross-platform, server side JavaScript based REST architecture web framework that uses standards based in HTTP client/server interaction with a focus on JSON formatted data. The framework allows for the use of a RESTful HTTP/JSON interface to data,that can create data models and automatically provide a HTTP interface. In further aims to provide reusable CommonJS modules and JSGI middleware to be used on a JSGI compliant JavaScript platform, but tested on NodeJS and RingoJS.

Fortune is a Node.js framework the aims to offer an application system for Node.js & web browsers. It intends to provide a data access layer (adapter), business logic layer (transform), and presentation layer (serializer). These layers allow for multiple data sources to be exposed via multiple formats through a uniform interface.

Flatiron is a Node.js framework that intends to offer a built collection of decoupled, unobtrusive tools that can operate in unison and independently. It aims to promote code organization and sustainability by clearly separating development concerns.

simpleS is a web framework for Node.JS that is aimed to be designed for the creatation of HTTP(S) servers and clients with features such as routing for http requests, static files, and errors, unique interface for requests and responses, and virtual hosting as well as others.
The MEAN.JS JavaScript Framework by MEAN.JS is designed to help developers build and maintain web applications using MongoDB, Express, AngularJS, and Node.js.
The MicroBees JavaScript SDK by MicroBees provides integration with an Internet of Things system to existing JavaScript applications. It can be used to connect with all of MicroBees' products.

The HTML9 JavaScript Framework by Louis Lazaris is a flexible, dependency-free, lightweight, device-agnostic, modular, baked-in, component framework MVC library designed to allow for a responsive CSS-based app architecture.

The goal of RestMVC is to provide a simple framework that assists deveopers to write a RESTful webservice using NodeJs, Express, Mongoose, and MongoDB. It's goal is to take out the repetition of code writing and allow for application development.
The Node.js framework Ni intends to offer a structure for organizing a application project and a file structure separated into models, views, controllers, libraries and helpers.

Tachi aims to provide developers with accelerated application development tools. The framework intends to offer an inital node.js MVC app, using a view syntax and an ASP.NET MVC-style project layout. Tachi aims to provide rapid development with an expandable feature set, and additional support of features to achieve that goal.

Roosevelt aims to be a web application development framework based on Express. Roosevelt intends to abstract all boilerplates necessary to build a typical Express app and provide a uniform MVC structure for application development.
Twee.io is a Node.js framework that offers developers conventions that will protect OOP and MVC maneer code from issues that arise in big projects and applications.

Grasshopper is a Node.js framework that offers web application development support. The framework provides features such as integrated support for dependency injection, filter for intercepting requests, supports basic and digest authentication, and the compression of static files.

Spine is a lightweight MVC library for building JavaScript web applications. It intends to offer developers structure and an architecture that complements patterns such as de-coupled components and CommonJS modules to help with code quality and maintainability. The framework's library is written in CoffeeScript.

rAppid.js intends to offer developers a declarative javascript web application framework for rapid web application development. It allows for the use of XML to define the structure of the application and to configure components such as datasources or routes. The framework aims to work by allowing the XML (XAML) to be translated to javascript components during runtime to render itself as HTML5 DOM elements. The framework was initally designed as a pure client side javascript library, however, it now offers an expendable web server with a request pipeline and different request handlers.

Josi is a web framework for node.js that aims to be a MVC web framework (e.g. ASP.NET MVC, Rails, Django). It allows for common features with Node.js, such as its asynchronous, event driven nature, possible to utilitze.

Raddish is an open-source NodeJS Framework that aims to provide a framework for modern web applications. The framework aims to be a design pattern based architecure that gives developers more flexibility in application development and features. It allows for what is written to be resuable and extensible pieces of code.

Codekart is a Node.js framework that intends to havea very small footprint, built for Node.js developers who need a simple toolkit to create full-featured web applications. The framework allows for developers to use shared hosting accounts and clients with deadlines.
Locomotive is a framework that aims to bring structure and MVC patterns to web applications using Node and Express.
Trintejs is a MVC boilerplate framework for ExpressJS backed by CaminteJS and Bootstrap.

Agni is a web framework built on top of Express, based on the principle of convention over configuration. It intends to allow for a thin layer of abstraction for route definition and directory organization, without giving up the full power and flexibility of Express. The framework does not include any database abstraction system, but leaves this choice to the developer.

Sleek.js is an MVC Wrapper Framework implemented from Node.jS that aims to be built-in with base dependency on handlebars.js. The Sleek.js architecture allows developers to follow the common format of MVC to handle and build sites with pluggable modules & themes support.
Geddy is a Node.js framework that aims to provide a structured web framework for web development.

Compoundjs is a MVC framework that aims to work on servers and browsers to build web applications to provide well-organized interfaces for Express compatible applications. The framework is a compound of three things: the Express framework, structure, and extensions.

Strapi aims to be an open-source Node.js rich framework for building applications and services. The framework allows for developers to write reusable application logic and spend less time on building infrastructure. The framework sits on top of Koa. It intends to combine small modules that work together to provide maintainability, and structural conventions to Node.js applications.

The Adonis framework is a MVC framework written in Node.js that intends to offer a customized resource for writing scalable applications by allowing for the defining of expressive routes and writing terminal commands.
